title: A Missing Drop: Free Your Mind From Conditioning And Reconnect To Your Truest Self
description: Have you ever felt lost? Have you ever felt broken and couldn’t seem to put the pieces back together?! Have you wondered who you are or where you belong, why is your life the way it is and how you can be happy?! If you are like me you have felt all mentioned above. What I know for sure is that in searching for things outside of us we spend our whole lives chasing ourselves. This book will help you to see that everything you need or will ever need is already within you. Your soul holds the key for all the answers. I’m not your guru who has all figured it out. I’m just here to guide you back to yourself.Reconnect to yourself and feel the power within. Give yourself permission to become the best version of you!
author: Ani Rich
